description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Take on your friends in this 1 - 4 player fight to the death!  Combining elements of many of your old, favourite classics into a single, modern, SUPERGAME OF TOTAL CHAOS AND DESTRUCTION!!
